name: ViaStitching
description: Zone-scoped via stitching array tools for KiCad PCB editor.

actions.name: Update Via Array
actions.description: Open zone settings and create/update a plugin-owned via array in the selected zone.

actions.name: Update Via Array (Maximize)
actions.description: Open zone settings and update with maximize-via packing enabled.

actions.name: Remove Via Array
actions.description: Remove plugin-owned vias from the selected zone, with optional user-via removal prompt.

actions.name: Clean Orphan Vias
actions.description: Remove plugin-owned vias that are no longer inside their owning zones.
